Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add inits_n_info folder with PRD workflow and ecosystem diagram

- ecosystem.drawio: Visual workflow showing all agents, commands, MCP servers
- jira-prd-workflow.md: Jira PRD review workflow documentation
- requirements.md: Placeholder for Designer agent requirements
- pdf-export-workflow.drawio: Example feature workflow diagram

Updated workflow includes:
- @designer agent with deep research (opus model)
- @architect with two-phase approach (Discovery â†’ PRD)
- /checkprd command for Jira PRD review loop
- HTML mockups as part of design outputs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix 6 P1 bugs: calendar dates, wake lock, workout entry validation

Bug fixes:
- SPT-42: Calendar shows workout logs on wrong days
  - Added formatLocalDate\(\) for proper timezone handling
  - Fixed day-of-week calculation in CalendarHeatmap

- SPT-43: Timer full screen resets after switching apps
  - Wake lock now re-acquires on visibility change
  - Track intent separately from actual state

- SPT-44: Workout log auto-completes when returning from timer
  - Require BOTH weight AND reps for Done button
  - Button disabled until entry is complete

- SPT-45: Exercise card moves to top before entry is complete
  - Moved PR/level checks from handleSetChange to handleSetDone
  - Card stays in place until user clicks Done

- SPT-46: PR celebration triggers too early
  - Same fix as SPT-45

- SPT-47: Allow 0x0 in workout log \(should block\)
  - Same fix as SPT-44

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
